answerText: Tbilisi[10] Tbilisi is the capital of this former Soviet Republic, which claims control of the breakaway region of Abkhazia.
heading: ICCS |2014 | 7 | 16 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Vladimir Arutyunian attempted to assassinate U.S. President George Bush in 2005 by throwing a grenade at him while he was speaking in this city's Freedom Square.  [10] Name this capital city on the Kura River, which is home to the ancient fortress of Narikala.
